trans-unit.source: Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Instalar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0

trans-unit.source: Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Instalar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to install the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: En este tema se explica cómo instalar el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] is designed to be backwards compatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] está diseñado para ser compatible con versiones anteriores de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] run unchanged in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Los cmdlets, proveedores, complementos, módulos y scripts escritos para [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] se ejecutan sin cambios en [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, Windows PowerShell host programs that were written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in later releases of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, debido a un cambio en la directiva de activación en tiempo de ejecución de Microsoft .NET Framework 4, los programas host de Windows PowerShell escritos para [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] y compilados con Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 no se puede ejecutar sin modificaciones en versiones posteriores de [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], que está compilado con CLR 4.0.

trans-unit.source: To maintain backward compatibility with commands and host programs that are affected by these changes, the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] engines are designed to run side\-by\-side.
trans-unit.target: Para mantener la compatibilidad con versiones anteriores de los comandos y los programas host que se ven afectados por estos cambios, los motores de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] están diseñados para ejecutarse en paralelo.

trans-unit.source: Also, the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Además, el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] se incluye en [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is intended to be used only when an existing script or host program cannot run because it is incompatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], or Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: El motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está destinado a usarse solo cuando un programa host o un script existente no se puede ejecutar porque no es compatible con [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: Such cases are expected to be rare.
trans-unit.target: Estos casos deben ser infrecuentes.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is an optional feature of [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_1](../Token/win8_client_1_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_1](../Token/win8_server_1_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: El motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] es una característica opcional de [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_1](../Token/win8_client_1_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[win8_server_1](../Token/win8_server_1_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: On earlier versions of Windows, when you install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] installation completely replaces the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] installation in the [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] installation directory.
trans-unit.target: En versiones anteriores de Windows, al instalar [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], la instalación de [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] reemplaza por completo la instalación de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] en el directorio de instalación de [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is retained.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] se conserva.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información acerca de cómo iniciar el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine feature is turned on by default.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], la característica del motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está activada de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: However, to use it, you need to turn on the option for Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5, which it requires.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, para usarla, debe activar la opción para Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5, que es necesaria.

trans-unit.source: This section also explains how to turn the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine feature on and off.
trans-unit.target: En esta sección también se explica cómo activar y desactivar la característica del motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To turn on .NET Framework 3.5
trans-unit.target: Para activar .NET Framework 3.5

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows Features**.
trans-unit.target: En la pantalla **Inicio**, escriba **Características de Windows**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Apps** bar, click **Settings**, and then click **Turn Windows features on or off**.
trans-unit.target: En la barra **Aplicaciones**, haga clic en **Configuración** y, después, en **Activar o desactivar las características de Windows**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Windows Features** box, click **.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0** to select it.
trans-unit.target: En el cuadro **Características de Windows**, haga clic en **.NET Framework 3.5 (incluye .NET 2.0 y 3.0)** para seleccionar esta opción.

trans-unit.source: When you select **.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0**, the box fills to indicate that only part of the feature is selected.
trans-unit.target: Al seleccionar **.NET Framework 3.5 (incluye .NET 2.0 y 3.0)**, el cuadro se rellena para indicar que solo una parte de la característica está seleccionada.

trans-unit.source: However, this is sufficient for the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, es suficiente para el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To turn the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine on and off
trans-unit.target: Para activar y desactivar el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows Features**.
trans-unit.target: En la pantalla **Inicio**, escriba **Características de Windows**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Apps** bar, click **Settings**, and then click **Turn Windows features on or off**.
trans-unit.target: En la barra **Aplicaciones**, haga clic en **Configuración** y, después, en **Activar o desactivar las características de Windows**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Windows Features** box, expand the **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]** node, and click the **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine** box to select or clear it.
trans-unit.target: En el cuadro **Características de Windows**, expanda el nodo **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]** y haga clic en la casilla **Motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]** para activarla o desactivarla.

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedures to add the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine and Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 features.
trans-unit.target: Use los procedimientos siguientes para agregar las características del motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] y Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: El motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] requiere Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 como mínimo.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Este requisito se cumple con Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.

trans-unit.source: To add the .NET Framework 3.5 feature
trans-unit.target: Para agregar la característica de .NET Framework 3.5

trans-unit.source: In **Server Manager**, from the **Manage** menu, select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: En el menú **Administrador del servidor** del menú **Administrar**, haga clic en **Agregar roles y características**.

trans-unit.source: Or in **Server Manager**, click **All Servers**, right\-click a server name, and then select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: O bien en **Administrador del servidor**, haga clic en **Todos los servidores**, haga clic con el botón derecho en el nombre de un servidor y, a continuación, seleccione **Agregar roles y características**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Installation Type** page, select **Role\-based or feature\-based installation**.
trans-unit.target: En la página **Tipo de instalación**, seleccione **Instalación basada en características o en roles**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Features** page, expand the **.NET 3.5 Framework Features** node and select **.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0)**.
trans-unit.target: En la página **Características**, expanda el nodo **Características de .NET Framework 3.5** y seleccione **.NET Framework 3.5 (incluye .NET 2.0 y 3.0)**.

trans-unit.source: The other options under that node are not required for the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: Las demás opciones bajo ese nodo no son necesarias para el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To add the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine feature
trans-unit.target: Para agregar la característica del motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: In **Server Manager**, from the **Manage** menu, select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: En el menú **Administrador del servidor** del menú **Administrar**, haga clic en **Agregar roles y características**.

trans-unit.source: Or **Server Manager**, click **All Servers**, right\-click a server name, and then select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: En **Administrador del servidor**, haga clic en **Todos los servidores**, haga clic con el botón derecho en el nombre de un servidor y, a continuación, seleccione **Agregar roles y características**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Installation Type** page, select **Role\-based or feature\-based installation**.
trans-unit.target: En la página **Tipo de instalación**, seleccione **Instalación basada en características o en roles**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Features** page, expand the **[!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] (Installed)** node and select **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine**.
trans-unit.target: En la página **Características**, expanda el nodo **[!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] (instalado)** y seleccione **Motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]**.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información acerca de cómo iniciar el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: On Earlier Systems
trans-unit.target: En sistemas anteriores

trans-unit.source: The [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881) package that installs [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], includes the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: El paquete [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881) que instala [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] en [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], incluye el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is enabled and ready to use, if necessary, without additional installation, setup, or configuration.
trans-unit.target: El motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está habilitado y listo para usar, si es necesario, sin requerir otras operaciones de instalación o configuración.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] package that installs [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], includes the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: El paquete [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] que instala [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] en [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], incluye el motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is enabled and ready to use, if necessary, without additional installation, setup, or configuration.
trans-unit.target: El motor de [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está habilitado y listo para usar, si es necesario, sin requerir otras operaciones de instalación o configuración.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Consulte también

trans-unit.target: Requisitos del sistema de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.target: Iniciar Windows PowerShell [ps]

trans-unit.source: Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Iniciar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0
